City Election Information
=========================

![Vote](https://www.lampasas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2334)


The City Secretary serves as the Chief Election Official for the City of Lampasas. City Elections are conducted in accordance with the
Texas Election Code
. The regular City Election is held annually on the first Saturday in May as required by the
Texas Election Code
. All municipal elections are publicized in accordance with the
Texas Election Code
.

**Mayor & Council Seats**

The City Council is composed of the mayor and six council members, such positions being numbered one through six, consecutively. The mayor and council members are all elected at large for two year terms.

City Council
------------

* Herb Pearce, Mayor
* Dorothy Person, Council Member,Â  Place 1
* Eric Hernandez, Council Member, Place 2
* Edward Gold, Council Member, Place 3
* Catherine Kuehne, Mayor Pro-Tem, Place 4
* Davis Keele, Council Member, Place 5
* Charlie Pratus, Council Member, Place 6
